text: Allaha eka udaharana nivedana karita ahe ki eka asa manusya, jyata aneka apasata bhinnata rakhanare bhagidara aheta ani dusara to manusya, jo phakta ekacaca dasa ahe. Kaya he doghe gunavaisistyata ekasamana aheta?1 Sarva prasansa allahakarita ahe. Vastavika, tyancyapaiki adhikansa loka janata nahita
